name: Radiant Glow Skincare Set
tagline: A 3-step brightening ritual for visible results in 14 days
description: A dermatologist-developed cleanser, serum, and moisturizer trio that targets dullness and uneven tone while remaining gentle on sensitive skin.
key_benefits: Clinically proven to improve radiance by 42% in two weeks
Fragrance-free and suitable for sensitive skin
Includes a travel-size SPF booster as a bonus
usage_notes: Recommend a morning and evening routine. Remind customers to patch-test and layer lightest to richest texture.

name: Peak Performance Wireless Headset
description: A premium Bluetooth headset featuring adaptive noise cancellation, dual device pairing, and 40 hours of battery life for remote professionals.
key_benefits: AI-enhanced microphone array that filters background noise
Memory foam ear cups engineered for 8+ hour comfort
USB-C fast charging delivers 8 hours of use in 15 minutes
usage_notes: Position as an upgrade from commodity headsets. Highlight warranty and enterprise volume discounts when relevant.

name: HydroTrack Smart Water Bottle
tagline: Personalized hydration coaching in a sleek bottle
description: A stainless steel, app-connected bottle that tracks water intake, glows to send reminders, and syncs with fitness apps to set adaptive hydration goals.
key_benefits: Sensors track temperature and sips in real time
App creates adaptive hydration goals based on activity
usage_notes: Great for wellness challenges and corporate gifting. Mention optional engraving and bundled family packs.
